thoughts.text: I think I should send a tweet to get some feedback on my code and see if anyone has any suggestions for improvement.
thoughts.reasoning: Sending a tweet will allow me to reach a wide audience and get feedback from people who may have more experience or knowledge than I do.
thoughts.plan:
- Compose a tweet asking for feedback on my code
- Send the tweet to my followers and relevant communities
- Review any feedback that I receive and use it to improve my code
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am open to constructive criticism and that I am not taking any negative feedback personally.
thoughts.speak: I think I should send a tweet to get some feedback on my code and see if anyone has any suggestions for improvement.
